projects.name: First project
projects.description: My first web project created to learn the basics of responsive web design, CSS Grid and Flexbox layout, and DOM manipulation.

projects.name: Recipe App
projects.description: A functional recipe app that fetches recipes from an API and let users find recipes based on different filters and sorting options.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A working weather app that fetches data from a weather API to display today's weather and a 5-day forecast. Includes a search bar where the user can search for a specific city.

projects.name: Web Accessibility Quiz
projects.description: A quiz about web accessibility where common accessibility guidelines were followed. The site is user-friendly and works for everyone, including those using screen readers, keyboards, and other assistive technologies.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: The website you are looking at right now. Built in React and styled using the CSS library Styled Components.
